name: cogov
author: Eric Yang (eric@junto.foundation), Raymond Powell (ray@cogov.tech), Joel Serino (joel@cogov.tech)

scripts.devray: ipconfig getifaddr en0 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --hot --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.build: npm run compile:sass && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m wip && git push
scripts.publish:hostgator: node-sass sass/main.scss css/style.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules && sftp -P 2222 cogov@cogov.tech < publish-hostgator-input.txt
scripts.publishall:hostgator: node-sass sass/main.scss css/style.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules && sftp -P 2222 cogov@cogov.tech < publishall-hostgator-input.txt
